summary:
For all your magic needs, this ring will give you unlimited magicka usage!

(The Archmage\'s secret performance enhancement :D)
descriptionHtml:
Tired of running out of magicka? This ring will give you unlimited magicka usage!

In order to get this ring, you have to:
1. Open the Console [use tilde key]
2. Type help abracadabra
3. Type - player.additem [itemid from previous step] 1
4. Enjoy!

Note: Since Skyrim only supports showing 3-4 enchantments, the others are not shown but they\'re there.
author: gracemillian
